title: Incomencia il Libro chiamato'il monte di oratione.
other_titles: Aue verum corpus domini natum ex Maria uirgine ...

notes.value:
Title from caption, leaf a2.

Imprint from Illustrated ISTC (CD-ROM, 2nd ed.)  Assigned by GW to the 16th century.  Cf. Goff.

Signatures: a⁴(-a1) b-g⁴.

Woodcut ill. on leaf g4v is of the crucified Christ.

LC copy's initial A (leaf a2) and ill. are hand-colored.

Goff M-850

Illustrated ISTC (CD-ROM, 2nd ed.) im00850000

Also available in digital form on the Library of Congress Web site.

Prayer at head of title in Latin; text in Italian.

LC copy has bookplate designed by Rouveyre, dated 1909, with the initials: R.H. (Robert Hottot).
